name: The Last ARRR
description:
You are a space pirate on a journey to earn enough gold to retire. Use the Roll of the Dice to tilt situations in your favour and come out on top.

For every situation you find yourself in, you can choose to use 1 to 4 dice. The outcome of each situation is determined by your dice roll.

The higher your roll, the more extreme your actions. Be warned that it is not always beneficial to use too many dice.

The game ends when your HP or dice reaches 0. Get as many gold as you can!

Written for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme was "Roll of the Dice".

Made By:

  • Ang Shi Ya - Art, Programming
  • Ian Teo - Game Designer, Programming
  • Ong Heng Le - Programming
  • Tan Wang Leng - Art

Music Credits:

"Smooth Move" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
"Dream Catcher" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
